name: Urban Mosh Pit
description:
Urban Mosh Pit is a split-screnn beat-em-up with a little twist. When the two players reach the middle of the map,  into a versus fighting game.

This game is the result of our participation in the Global Game Jam 2022.  The theme was "Duality".

We unfortunately could not reach all our ojectives in 72h, so some mecanics are not yet implemented (dash and grab). However we have the dash on the way and we'll try to finish it in the near future and upload a new version of the game.

Big thanks to the team, we did an amazing work !

Nathael Godeux (Game Artist)

Louis Keuker (Game Artist)

Alexis Martelli (Game Designer)

Bruno D. (Game Designer)

Hugo Picolo (Game Designer)
